message:
http://Notedn.com
==========
I built Notedn.com two years ago

i built it for personal usage at first , then i developed it to be a public online service

it was takefastnotes.com at the beginning, it was in arabic and english interfaces and for notes only

a year ago i developed it to a new only english version , added (Taskbook) feature and planned for two more features ( codebook ) & ( linkbook ) , but i never had time to do them ,

do you have any advices about the site because i think about taking it down :(
story: AbdAllah Khashaba shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Notedn | Keep your notes in the cloud
caption: notedn.com
description: Notedn is an online notes manager and a cloud service that makes it easy for you to save your notes, links, codes and create to-do lists. It makes them reachable anywhere anytime. You can use reminders and categories to remember your notes and organize them. You also can use to-do lists to organizeâ€¦

data.message: Register with facebook asks to access friends list....no good

The scopes sent to facebook API are : 

&scope=email,user_birthday

The friend list is add by default by Facebook 

Note : i do not save any thing from your data except username , facebook_id , email and birthday
